mapper.select: select movie_seq,movie_picture,movie_country,movie_title,movie_genre,movie_summary,movie_director,movie_rate,movie_actor,movie_video,movie_price,movie_runtime,movie_producer,movie_sdate,movie_sumaudience,movie_age,admin_id from tbl_movie where movie_title LIKE '%' || #{movie_title} || '%'

select movie_seq,movie_picture,movie_country,movie_title,movie_genre,movie_summary,movie_director,movie_rate,movie_actor,movie_video, movie_price,movie_runtime,movie_producer,movie_sdate,movie_sumaudience,movie_age,admin_id from tbl_movie where movie_seq = 1 or movie_seq = 6 or movie_seq = 7 or movie_seq = 8 or movie_seq = 12 or movie_seq = 13 or movie_seq = 17 or movie_seq = 20 or movie_seq = 27 or movie_seq = 30 or movie_seq = 35 or movie_seq = 36 or movie_seq = 37 or movie_seq = 38 or movie_seq = 40 or movie_seq = 44 or movie_seq = 56 or movie_seq = 62
